page.title: 11CHILSWORTHY'S WAY OF LIFE
page.content:
There is a bonfire on the village green every Guy Fawkes night.There is also a Christmas party every year in the village hall where the children of the area play games and have food while the parents sit and watch.Local people arrange the many activities that go on during the year. Local people also arrange a youth club every Friday.In the summer they do outdoors activities and in the winter they have games in the village hall.On special occasions,such as Christmas and anniversaries,the children from the Sunday School perform a play in the hall.
{by Dionne Stephens, Rachel Parrish { and Denise Smale.
